title: I.Sicily inscription 000819
support: A funerary altar, damaged upper right; the text is set out in a simple incised square frame.

handNote.lettering: Lunate sigma, epsilon both quadrate and lunate.

provenanceObserved._: Observed and photographed, Prag, 02.03.2023; in storage in depositi of the museum in ex-complesso conventuale di Sant'Antonio da Padova.

graphics.desc: Photo J. Prag, 02.03.2023, with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

museum.name: Museo Civico di Noto
museum.description: The museum was damaged in an earthquake and all the ancient archaeological material was sent to the Paolo Orsi for safe keeping. They have not yet been returned and the collection currently consists of stones from various medieval buildings, some medieval armour and weaponry, and 2 ancient inscribed blocks
